CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 27, 1956, pg. 3, reads: "'Hole in Shoe' - Students of Fifth Ave. High School volunteered to march through the downtown section on Oct. 23 in the 'Walk With Adlai' drive and shine shoes without any pay. Placard shown on right is reminder of Stevenson's 1952 'hole in my shoe.'  Left to right, the students are Joan Hersh, Alfreda Johnson and Ada Joseph. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Joan Hersh, Alfreda Johnson, and Ada Joseph holding a giant shoe sole shaped sign inscribed "Free Shine," for Adlai Stevenson campaign, Downtown
